1.29.25  6:26 am   do you consider knowing the length of a song before hearing it a spoiler?

      technically yes

      i feel it's often misunderstood

      AND. tacos AND the name eugene

1.29.25  2:34 am   Thoughts on the Gothic language?

      never heard of it

1.29.25  1:27 am   do you often know what you're talking about

      i guess i can't be sure

1.29.25  1:03 am   if you summoned a genie what would your three wishes be

      not to summon a genie

1.29.25  12:02 am   how do i find purpose in music?

      it finds you. or it doesn't. there's nothing you can really do about it

1.28.25  11:54 pm   What's better: thinking or not thinking?

      it's a trade off. you have to mix them together

1.28.25  11:44 pm   favorite sunspot

      the moon

1.28.25  11:00 pm   aaaaaaaa when is my life gonna get better

      pretty soon

1.28.25  10:23 pm   how do i convey that whenever i release a piece of art that it is exactly how i wanted it to be? like some people look at an aspect of it and they think it was an accident but it was actually very carefully thought out

      what you wanna do is go out and get a chip and then put it on your shoulder

1.28.25  9:55 pm   if A = 3 and B = 2, what is A+B+C?

      5+C

1.28.25  9:53 pm   Would you ever get a piercing. Like an eyebrow piercing or earlobe

      i wouldn't want to

1.28.25  9:26 pm   opinions on hand cranked flashlights

      i've never seen one

1.28.25  9:18 pm   i confess that i did a deep dive through a lot of your recordings on this website (the raw stuff, just you singing with keys, etc.)

you have serious chops on a lot of instruments, and i'd like to know how much of that really was trial and error, learning by ear, vs. taking lessons, learning from a book, etc. 

      i'm pretty much a control freak, so, i learned on my own

1.28.25  8:12 pm   are you a boy or a girl 

      let me check

1.28.25  7:31 pm   My piano has an umbilical cord, what now. 

      what was happening before

1.28.25  7:31 pm   Do you have a day job flipping burgers or something

      all i have to do is identify what is and is not a burger. i am a burger identifier

1.28.25  5:11 pm   im sad, can you tell me a joke to fell less sad?

      no, there's nothing i can do

1.28.25  5:08 pm   not a question but thank you for being here 

      you're welcome

1.28.25  4:08 pm   So, did the world end in 2012?
Because I'm still not sure if it did or didn't...

      terrence mckenna's worldview ended, or at least needed a serious re-adjustment

1.28.25  3:31 pm   what fonts did you use for your video titled "ball and stick"/

      regular

1.28.25  3:04 pm   how to do better in my college classes

      i don't know anything about this. maybe try to make friends with the teacher?

1.28.25  2:42 pm   Thoughts on youtube content farms? (I hate them)

      but they're so ....... ORGANIC wait no sorry i was thinking of something totally different

1.28.25  2:36 pm   Is a cucumber a pickle or is a pickle a cucumber? Sometimes the cucumber just tastes better pickled. Do you agree?

      pickles don't work for me, but that's not the pickles' fault

1.28.25  1:38 pm   5 squares vs 3 circles, who wins?

      at which game? i assume you mean the "being a circle" game. the circles win at that

1.28.25  1:26 pm   why is it spelled ueqstions?

      it's not ueqstions, it's ueqstions

1.28.25  12:34 pm   would you ever use a bitcrush effect in a song

      sure, i've done it quite a lot. for sound effects in non-songs as well

1.28.25  12:28 pm   opinion on CTRL + A + BACKSPACE shortcut?

      almost too easy

1.28.25  12:26 pm   do you ever find it trippy how easy it is to communicate with fans on here and how much easier it is for us that we are anonymous?

      it can be pretty chill, i'll admit. although i'm sure some people hate it

1.28.25  12:00 pm   Do you think there's any way that your school experience (I'm primarily talking about middle and high school here) could have been improved upon so that it would have been more beneficial/enjoyable/fruitful for you? Do you think the curriculum could have been improved upon in any way? If so, how? Do you think subjects could have maybe been taught in a way that would be a bit more compatible with your learning style? Do you think you would have benefitted from special accommodations that would have allowed you to learn in a way more compatible with your own learning style while still being in a school environment? If so, what accommodations do you think you could have benefitted from? Or do you think your learning style was/is just completely incompatible with any kind of school environment? In which case, what recommendation(s) would you have for parents who have a child in a similar situation as you when you were growing up? Sorry for the long question. Hope your 2025 is going well so far.

     school is not necessarily the best place to learn things from the actual curriculum. unless it's seriously some kind of miracle program. learning is only effective when you're deeply inspired and curious. it's hard to reliably prescribe curiosity en masse. sometimes something or someone may cause inspiration, but you never know when that's gonna happen. 'school' however, sort of has a lot of other purposes than just learning things from the curriculum. i mean at least it's an excuse for everyone in town to see each other. people have a lot to learn from each other, regardless of who they are

1.28.25  11:29 am   looking for some advice. hypothetically, if there was a website to ask someone anything, what would you ask

      i would test their knowledge about prime numbers by asking them what the next prime quadruplet is, after the 190s

1.28.25  8:41 am   How should someone handle bullies? 

      you have to take a look at how and why they are handling you

1.28.25  7:46 am   What do you think about connections?

      dank

1.28.25  3:09 am   why do rectangles look tasty

      branding ought to do the trick

1.28.25  2:10 am   what is your opinion on the danish language?

      i've never really experienced it first hand, but i am aware that it is extremely close to norwegian and swedish, especially in writing

1.28.25  1:18 am   are you able to send images when responding to these questions? if not, it'd be a very nice addition

      yes, i do that sometimes when necessary

1.28.25  1:15 am   do you believe soap exists? or is it just something made up by scientists

      both

1.28.25  12:08 am   I have no idea what to do in the future as a career. Any ideas so i have at least the slightest clue? 

      just do what you're gonna do, and then later if someone absolutely insists that you fit that into the word 'career' then you can try to figure out what they are looking for

1.27.25  11:33 pm   what's the most obscure joke you made in the past week

      told the truth

      all of them, don't worry about it

      regretfully, i must admit, "a name"

1.27.25  9:30 pm   favorite irrational number

      √2

      it is able to show me things i like that otherwise have no names and are indescribable

1.27.25  9:03 pm   what's your spirit animal

      regular

1.27.25  8:35 pm   do you think ghosts are real?

      you can make a ghost real, as long as you pick the right thing to call a ghost

1.27.25  8:22 pm   Humans started doing art at the same time they started doing religion. Do you think there is a connection?

      do you think you can be sure of the accuracy of that statistic

      Guiness does indeed track this

1.27.25  7:45 pm   How long do songs need to be?

      1 planck, give or take

1.27.25  6:47 pm   i find it beautiful that my gf and i's name have the same vowel-consonant pattern and the third and fourth letter is both repeating. Hanni and Mello. do you find it beautiful too?

      it seems irresistible to rearrange it to Manni and Hello
